articles.content:
Congratulations to Kim Jong Il
    Pyongyang, December 23 (KCNA) -- Leader Kim Jong Il received a congratulatory letter from the military attaches' corps here on the occasion of the 12th anniversary of his assumption of the supreme commandership of the Korean People's Army.
 The letter was handed today to KPA Vice-Marshal Kim Il Chol, minister of the People's Armed Forces, by Abdullah Hamidi Benam, military attache of the Iranian embassy here who is doyen of the corps.

articles.title: Greetings to 4th Congress of "United Russia"
articles.content:
Wreaths Laid before Bust of Kim Jong Suk
    Pyongyang, December 23 (KCNA) -- the diplomatic corps and the military attaches' corps here laid wreaths before the bust of  Kim Jong Suk, an anti-Japanese war hero, at the Revolutionary Martyrs' Cemetery on Mt. Taesong on Dec. 23 on the occasion of her 86th birth anniversary.
 They paid silent tribute to her after laying the wreaths with profound reverence for Kim Jong Suk who was boundlessly loyal to President Kim Il Sung and performed immortal exploits for the sacred cause for the country's liberation and its eternal prosperity, weathering out the stern tempest of the revolution.    
 Written on the ribbon of the wreaths were the letters "The revolutionary exploits of anti-Japanese war hero Comrade Kim Jong Suk will be immortal!"

articles.title: 9th Military Working-level Talks Held
articles.content:
Greetings to 4th Congress of "United Russia"
    Pyongyang, December 23 (KCNA) -- The Central Committee of the Workers' Party of Korea sent a message of greetings to the 4th Congress of the All-Russia Party "United Russia" on Dec. 22.
 The message said that the 4th party congress would be an important and significant event in social and political life of Russia.    
 Expressing the belief that the friendly relations between the two parties would contribute to further strengthening the traditional DPRK-Russia relations of friendship, the message wished the All-Russia Party great success in the work of the 4th congress.
